description:
Revel in Herbal Essences Hello Hydration Shampoo's Coconut fragrance while indulging in thirst-quenching hydration from root to tip that will leave your hair softer and sweetly-scented. The shampoo is fragrance infused and nature inspired.

- Moisturising Shampoo for dry and damaged hair

- Thirst-quenching hydration from root to tip that leaves your hair softer and sweetly-scented

- Creamy Coconut essences

- Infused Fragrances

- Nature Inspired

Herbal Essences Hello Hydration Shampoo with botanical silk extract, cleans to help reveal natural shine.

Deep dive into this shampoo's moisturisers with Hawaiian cocoa and orchid extracts. 

SOAK it up! The coconut might be one of the hardest working fruits out there, known for its moisturising properties and dreamy tropical scent. Revel in creamy Coconut fragrance as you fantasise about your next exotic get-away while moisturising lather replenishes much-needed moisture to your thirsty tresses.

Up to 100% softer (Hello Hydration shampoo and conditioner vs. non-conditioning shampoo) in 1 wash  vs. non-conditioning shampoo.

0% Nasties. Full of Naturally Sourced Ingredients*
*no added parabens & colourants



Softer in one wash (with Hello Hydration system use vs. non-conditioning shampoo).

Revel in creamy Coconut fragrance as you fantasise about your next exotic get-away while moisturising lather replenishes much-needed moisture to your thirsty tresses.

Soak it up.
name: Herbal Essences Shampoo Hello Hydration 300mL
